rule.name: product_requires_product_category
rule.description: The product_requires_product_category rule specifies that all instances of product shall have at least 1 associated product_related_product_category instance.

where.label: WR1
where.description: Each instance of product shall be associated to at least one instance of product_related_product_category.

rule.name: restrict_product_category_name
rule.description: The restrict_product_category_name rule specifies that each instance of product_category shall have a name of 'assembly', 'detail', 'part', 'raw material', 'document', 'functionality', or 'requirement' or the description value shall exist.

where.label: WR1
where.description: Each instance of product_category shall have a name of 'part', 'raw material', 'document', 'functionality', or 'requirement' or the description value shall exist.
